title: Churchill's Kencel on Capital Raise, Expects Active Year for M&A
description: Churchill Asset Management CEO Ken Kencel discusses raising $16 billion for its senior lending program. Speaking on "Bloomberg The Close," Kencel says institutions are continuing to increase their commitments to private credit and expects a very active year in 2026. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Churchill Asset Management CEO Ken Kencel discusses raising $16 billion for its senior lending program. Speaking on "Bloomberg The Close," Kencel says institutions are continuing to increase their commitments to private credit and expects a very active year in 2026. (Source: Bloomberg)
